ttp_template:
<group name="neighbor">
  Neighbor {{NEIGHBOR | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="dr">
  DR: {{DR | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
VLAN 10
  Neighbor 10.0.0.1
  Uptime: 00:45:23
  Expire: 00:01:36
  DR: no
  Bidir: no
VLAN 20
  Neighbor 10.0.0.2
  Uptime: 01:15:12
  Expire: 00:02:23
  DR: yes
  Bidir: yes
VLAN 30
  Neighbor 10.0.0.3
  Uptime: 00:10:11
  Expire: 00:00:59
  DR: yes
  Bidir: no
textfsm_template:
Value VLAN (\S+)
Value NEIGHBOR (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value UPTIME (\d+:\d+:\d+)
Value EXPIRE (\d+:\d+:\d+)
Value DR (yes|no)
Value BIDIR (yes|no)

Start
  ^VLAN\s+${VLAN}\s*$$
  ^\s*Neighbor\s+${NEIGHBOR}\s*$$
  ^\s*Uptime:\s+${UPTIME}\s*$$
  ^\s*Expire:\s+${EXPIRE}\s*$$
  ^\s*DR:\s+${DR}\s*$$
  ^\s*Bidir:\s+${BIDIR}\s*$$ -> Record
